about_the_game:
Experience the frantic soundtrack of Carsteroids with your awesome home stereo or while driving your car!

Imagine a dark future, after Earth resources are depleted.
Mankind is gone to the stars. The resource extraction takes place on the Asteroid belt. After the mining age another dark age came. Civil war, Alien encounters, new technology mixes with the old one...
They made a mess in the sky.
Imagine to live an adventure in that period of time. Close your eyes.

The Governor of Vesta created a combat game show to avoid the war, the game was called Carsteroids. It's a challenging tournament where all the pilots and the fighters gather to find their fortune. Buntan, one of our protagonists, will need to win the final prize for getting out from his sudden troubles...

The soundtrack contains extended versions of all the Carsteroids tracks in MP3 and WAV lossless format
